txt.en: You have crushed a grodbog scent-gland
Thórhall believes that the scent-glands you gathered may lure the hive-queen into revealing herself, allowing her to be slain.

'What do you know, [placeholder]; I have had an idea! If you crush the scent-glands you gathered, an overwhelming scent will be released, and the gredbyg will rise up.\n\n'The scent will undoubtedly draw the hive-queen from her hidden nest. If you can slay her, the entire hive will be greatly weakened... at least until they can raise a new queen. That should keep them out of our way for quite a while, and that is the best we can hope for.'
The grodbog-lair is in the Palace of Náin, north of Lamâb-dûm.\n\nThórhall asked you to take the scent-glands to the grodbog-hive and crush them. The resulting scent should draw forth the hive-queen.
'Excellent work, [placeholder]! With the grodbog hive-queen slain, the hive will be thrown into disarray, and their numbers will likewise diminish... at least until they can raise a new queen.'
Thórhall is at the small dwarf-camp in Lamab-dûm, south of the Palace of Náin.\n\nYou should report back to Thórhall with news of your success.
Wafri is at the Dolven-view camp, south-east of the Palace of Náin.\n\nYou should report back to Wafri with news of your success.
'Did my plan work, [placeholder]?\n\n'What? You haven't tried it yet? Well, get to it! Better you than me.'
Summon and defeat the grodbog hive-queen
Talk to Wafri at the Dolven-view camp
Talk to Wafri at the Dolven-view camp
